summary: When the Department of Homeland Security began operations in 2003, its leadership faced the daunting task of transforming 22 agencies into one department. Although DHS has been on our High Risk List since then, the department has made considerable progress. We testified about this progress, as well as actions still needed to address management challenges. For example, we recommended that DHS strengthen its management of...
title: Department of Homeland Security: Continued Leadership Is Critical to Addressing a Range of Management Challenges
